plugins.name: One Click Export
plugins.description:
📌 ストーリー

フレームを指定してエクスポートをするときに、意図しない下の階層でエクスポートがされて悲しんでいる方々をたくさん見てきました。

そこで！少しでも役に立てればと思いプラグインを作っちゃいました！


このプラグインなら、セクションをクリックするだけで、その直下にあるフレームをボタンひとつで "カンタン" にエクスポートできちゃいます。

これで間違った階層でのエクスポートミスも防げるようになりました！

やったね🙌


📝 使い方

  1. プラグインを起動する
  2. セクションをクリックする
  3. セクション上にあるフレームがリストで表示されるので、順番にエクスポートのボタンをクリックする


⭐️ 今後のアップデート予定

  1. イケてるUIにする
  2. セクション上にあるフレームをまとめてエクスポートできるようにする
plugins.tagline: セクション直下にあるフレームをカンタンにエクスポートできる

plugins.name: Juxync
plugins.description:
Want to get alpha access to Jux? Visit jux.io


Jux is a code-based canvas design tool that plugs right into developer's codebase, enabling product designers to design the UI itself and developers its logic.

Creating a good color tokens system is a complex task. Use Juxync to import your variables to Jux to use as design tokens. Juxync will convert your variables collections, groups and modes into token sets to use in Jux. It will maintain all the relationships between variables.


How does Juxync work?

For more visual ‘how does it work‘, visit the knowledge base

  1. It scans Figma color variables in your chosen file.
  2. The plugin auto maps the tokens into core, and other semantics sets.
  3. Sync the tokens into the Jux token management, allowing developers to view and use these tokens via our CLI.


Next up: (or Future features)

  1. Sync Assets (SVG)
  2. Dimensions tokens
  3. Typography styles
  4. Check out the roadmap for more information


Want to be among the first to join the alpha? Join our community

accepted.name: Jux
accepted.description: We’re building a code-based design tool so designers can design the actual, real product as it will be used in production.

plugins.tagline: Juxync imports your Figma Variables as design tokens to Jux, seamlessly.

plugins.name: コーディング計算ツール
plugins.description:
レイヤーから取得できる数値をコーディングで使用する数値に自動計算します。

あなたのコーディング作業が少しでも楽になりますように。


【行間の倍率変換】

テキストレイヤーを選択すると文字サイズと行間を取得して倍率値に変換します。

以下の場合は計算できません。

  1. 行間がautoの場合
  2. オートレイアウト、グループ化レイヤーを選択
  3. テキストレイヤー以外のレイヤーを選択


【単位変換】

px値を別の単位に変換します。

各単位共通でテキストレイヤーなら文字サイズを取得し、その他のレイヤーなら横幅を取得しますが、単位ごとに連動するフィールドが異なります。


em：

レイヤーを選択すると「基準値」が変動します。

rem：

レイヤーを選択すると「変換したいpx値」が変動します。基準値は16が初期値になります。

%：

レイヤーを選択すると「基準値」が変動します。

vw：

レイヤーを選択すると「基準値」と「変換したいpx値」が変動します。

「基準値」は一番外側のフレームサイズになり、「変換したいpx値」は選択中のレイヤーの数値になります。


【clamp関数】

レイヤーから数値を取得して、clamp(最小値, 推奨値, 最大値)の形式で出力します。

フレームサイズが700px以下の場合は最小値と最小画面幅が、701px以上だと最大値と最大画面幅が連動し、レイヤーから数値を取得します。emとremは基準値も設定できます。


【その他共通仕様】

  1. 結果をクリックでクリップボードにコピーします。
  2. 「値変動」をOFFにするとレイヤーからの取得をやめ、普通の計算機になります。
  3. 出力結果が小数点になる場合は少数第3位まで表示します。
plugins.tagline: コーディングで使用する数値に変換する補助ツール。

plugins.name: Variable Remapper
plugins.description:
OVERVIEW


The Variable Remapper is a powerful Figma plugin designed to streamline design system management by enabling seamless migration and remapping of variables between different libraries and collections. This tool is essential for teams managing complex design systems, migrating between libraries, or consolidating variable usage across projects.


CORE CAPABILITIES


Variable Remapping

The plugin provides comprehensive bulk variable migration capabilities, automatically remapping variables from one library to another across entire design systems. The intelligent name matching system matches variables between source and target libraries based on name similarity, reducing manual configuration requirements.

Users can exercise precise scope control by choosing to remap variables across selected objects only, the current page, or all pages in the document. Additionally, collection-specific remapping allows filtering to specific variable collections for granular control over migration processes.


Variable Analysis and Mapping

The system offers comprehensive variable listing functionality to scan and catalog all variable bindings throughout designs. The detailed view presents every variable binding with complete contextual information, including node names and types, bound properties such as fills, strokes, effects, and dimensions, current variable names and sources, plus complete library and collection information.

The grouped view consolidates similar variable bindings for streamlined bulk management operations, while the interactive mapping table enables manual specification of target variables for precise control over remapping processes.


Library Management

The plugin provides robust multi-library support, working seamlessly with local variables in current files, team library variables, and remote libraries. Automatic library detection identifies variable sources and displays comprehensive library information throughout the interface.

Users can browse through variable collections with detailed counts and metadata, supported by real-time loading of library collections and variables for immediate access to current information.


KEY FEATURES


Precision Control

The plugin supports comprehensive property-level binding across all Figma variable binding types, including color variables for fills and strokes, dimension variables for width, height, corner radius, and stroke weight, effect variables for opacity, rotation, and positioning, and boolean variables for visibility controls.

Advanced array property support handles complex bindings such as multiple fills or effects, while safe remapping functionality validates target variables before applying changes to ensure data integrity throughout the migration process.


Advanced Analysis

The binding discovery system automatically identifies all variable bindings across complex node hierarchies, providing complete visibility into variable usage patterns. Source attribution functionality shows exactly where each variable originates, whether from the current file, specific team library names, or remote libraries.

Collection context displays variable collection names for improved organization and understanding of variable relationships throughout the design system.


User Experience

The tabbed interface provides clean separation between remapping and analysis functions, enabling focused workflows for different use cases. Real-time feedback includes loading states, progress indicators, and detailed status messages to keep users informed throughout operations.

Comprehensive error handling delivers actionable feedback when issues arise, while the modern user interface utilizes Figma-native styling with responsive design principles for seamless integration with existing workflows.


USE CASES


Design System Migration

Organizations can migrate from deprecated variable libraries to updated versions, consolidate multiple libraries into a single source of truth, and update variable references when reorganizing design systems. This capability is essential for maintaining consistency during design system evolution and reducing technical debt.


Theme Management

Teams can efficiently switch between light and dark theme variables, apply brand-specific variable sets across different product lines, and test various variable configurations during design exploration phases. This functionality supports rapid iteration and brand consistency maintenance.


Cleanup and Optimization

The plugin enables identification of unused or orphaned variable bindings, standardization of variable usage across teams, and comprehensive auditing of variable implementation across large-scale projects. These capabilities support design system hygiene and optimization efforts.


Workflow Automation

Organizations can batch update variable references during design system updates, streamline handoff processes between design and development teams, and maintain consistency across multiple Figma files. This automation reduces manual work and minimizes human error in variable management processes.
plugins.tagline: Streamline design system by bulk remapping variables across libraries, pages, and components.

plugins.name: Variant Multi-Selector
plugins.description:
Tired of manually selecting variant properties one by one?


Variant Multi-Selector solves this by allowing you to multi-select multiple properties and values together — and instantly filter, edit, and manage matching variants inside your component set! 🚀


✨ Key Features:

•Select multiple properties (like Size, State, Type) at once

•Apply filters and select matching variants instantly

•View bound variables attached to your variants (Figma Variables integration!)

•Designed for fast, large-scale Design System workflows


🔥 Perfect for:

•Design system builders

•Product designers managing large variant sets

•UI/UX designers who want to speed up Figma workflows


🙏 Built with love and real-world design pain.
plugins.tagline: Select and edit multiple variant properties at once.

130411.tagline: Select and edit multiple variant properties at once.

plugins.name: SVG Export no Fill
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to export SVG icons from Figma without the fill attribute, making it easy to modify the icon colors later. You can upload the SVG files to platforms like Elementor or use them with CSS to easily change icon colors via the interface or stylesheets.

Ideal for developers who need reusable, customizable icons that can be easily adapted in various projects.
plugins.tagline: Export SVG icons without fill for easy CSS styling

130213.name: SVG Export no Fill
130213.description:
This plugin allows you to export SVG icons from Figma without the fill attribute, making it easy to modify the icon colors later. You can upload the SVG files to platforms like Elementor or use them with CSS to easily change icon colors via the interface or stylesheets.

Ideal for developers who need reusable, customizable icons that can be easily adapted in various projects.
130213.tagline: Export SVG icons without fill for easy CSS styling

plugins.name: Frame Size Manager
plugins.description: A Figma plugin that lets you create, save, and apply custom size presets and naming conventions to your design elements. Quickly resize frames, components, and other objects while automatically applying consistent naming patterns with prefixes and suffixes. Perfect for design systems and teams that need to maintain consistent dimensions and naming across projects.
plugins.tagline: Streamline your Figma workflow with quick access to size presets and naming conventions.

127263.name: Frame Size Manager
127263.description: A Figma plugin that lets you create, save, and apply custom size presets and naming conventions to your design elements. Quickly resize frames, components, and other objects while automatically applying consistent naming patterns with prefixes and suffixes. Perfect for design systems and teams that need to maintain consistent dimensions and naming across projects.
127263.tagline: Streamline your Figma workflow with quick access to size presets and naming conventions.

plugins.name: FigCrawl
plugins.description:
FigCrawl: Your FigJam Content Extractor


What is FigCrawl?

FigCrawl is a powerful FigJam plugin that transforms your collaborative boards into structured, AI-ready data. It intelligently extracts and organizes all your board's content while preserving the visual hierarchy and relationships between elements.


Use Cases

For Designers & Teams

  1. Extract structured content from brainstorming sessions
  2. Convert visual collaboration into actionable data
  3. Document and archive board content
  4. Share board content in a structured format


For AI/LLM Integration

  1. Feed board content into AI tools
  2. Generate summaries and reports
  3. Analyze relationships between ideas
  4. Create structured documentation


For Documentation

  1. Export board content for documentation
  2. Create structured reports
  3. Archive important board sessions
  4. Share insights with stakeholders



How It Works

  1. Launch: Open the plugin in your FigJam board
  2. Extract: Click "Extract Content" to scan your board
  3. Review: See a summary of extracted content
  4. Copy: Choose to copy the entire board or individual pages
  5. Use: Paste the JSON into your preferred AI tool or LLM
plugins.tagline: Extract FigJam content into AI-ready data with one click

126334.name: FigCrawl
126334.description:

  5. Use: Paste the JSON into your preferred AI tool or LLM
126334.tagline: Extract FigJam content into AI-ready data with one click

plugins.name: Structura – Effortless Page Organization
plugins.description:
Effortlessly organize and standardize your Figma files with reusable page templates.


Structura helps teams and designers maintain consistency across projects by enabling the creation, saving, and application of structured page layouts. Whether you prefer using built-in presets or custom templates, Structura simplifies your workflow, ensuring every file is clear and organized.



✨ Key Features


  1. Create & Save Custom Templates – Design your own page structures and reuse them effortlessly.
  2. Use Ready-Made Presets – Get started instantly with professionally designed page layouts.
  3. One-Click Template Application – Quickly apply a structure to any Figma file.
  4. Consistent File Organization – Standardize file layouts for better team collaboration.
  5. Easy Editing & Updating – Modify and update templates as your workflow evolves.



🚀 How to Use


  1. Choose a Template – Select from built-in presets or create your own.
  2. Apply to Your File – Instantly structure your Figma pages with one click.
  3. Customize as Needed – Edit sections or save new layouts for future use.
  4. Stay Organized – Ensure every file follows a consistent and streamlined structure.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly organize and standardize your Figma files with reusable page templates.

plugins.name: Import AppStore Screenshots
plugins.description:
Screens.farm


How to import iOS screenshots into Figma

  1. In figma, open the plugin menu and launch "Appstore Screenshots"
  2. Enter the iOS app name or url
  3. Click Import


✅ Screenshots are added to your canvas, perfectly aligned and ready to use.


---


Why use screens.farm?

  1. Save hours by skipping the download → upload → organize loop
  2. Instantly grab all App Store screenshots in one click
  3. Create moodboards, presentations, or competitor benchmarks effortlessly
  4. Speed up your app store page redesign workflow
  5. Collaborate with teams on real product screenshots, directly in Figma


---


🎁 FREE version includes limited app imports


---


🚀 License


Unlock the full power of **screens.farm** with a PRO license:


  1. Unlimited app imports
  2. Faster imports with priority processing
  3. Import iPhone & iPad screenshots
  4. Premium support


---


Stop wasting time downloading screenshots one by one.

Let screens.farm do the heavy lifting — so you can focus on design.
plugins.tagline: Import ios apps in one click

plugins.name: Private Notes
plugins.description:
Private Notes allows you to attach personal annotations to any layer in your Figma file that remain completely private to you.


  1. Truly Private: Notes are stored locally and their contents are only visible to you, never to other collaborators
  2. Visual Markers: Customisable markers show where you've left notes (only visible when you run the plugin)
  3. Flexible Positioning: Place note markers in 8 different positions around your layers that stay fixed to the right frame.
  4. Persistent Storage: Your notes remain attached to layers even when you close and reopen Figma


Perfect for designers who want to keep track of personal thoughts, reminders, and to-dos without cluttering the file with comments visible to everyone.


Use it for recording client feedback, noting implementation details, or leaving yourself breadcrumbs for areas that need further attention.


Please contact me for any feedback. suggestions or issues!
plugins.tagline: Keep your thoughts private- annotations only you can see.

123689.name: Private Notes
123689.description:
Private Notes allows you to attach personal annotations to any layer in your Figma file that remain completely private to you.

  2. Visual Markers: Customisable markers show where you've left notes (only visible when you run the plugin)
  3. Flexible Positioning: Place note markers in 8 different positions around your layers that stay fixed to the right frame.
  4. Persistent Storage: Your notes remain attached to layers even when you close and reopen Figma


Perfect for designers who want to keep track of personal thoughts, reminders, and to-dos without cluttering the file with comments visible to everyone.


Use it for recording client feedback, noting implementation details, or leaving yourself breadcrumbs for areas that need further attention.


Please contact me for any feedback. suggestions or issues!
123689.tagline: Keep your thoughts private- annotations only you can see.

plugins.name: Zuuvi Export Service
plugins.description:
Zuuvi Export Service is a Figma plugin designed to integrate Figma with Zuuvi’s Studio platform, making it easier and more efficient for designers who work with both tools. The plugin helps reduce the need to manually recreate designs in Studio after first mocking them up in Figma. While built around Figma’s capabilities, the exported result aims to reflect the original design as closely as possible within the constraints of Studio’s features.


Easily export ad creatives from Figma directly into your Zuuvi workspace - ready for production, personalisation, and cross-channel publishing.

Whether you're designing HTML5 banners, social media ads, retail media formats or in-store screens, this plugin helps creative teams move faster and stay in control.


🔧 What You Can Do with the Zuuvi Plugin:

  1. Export static or layered ad designs directly from Figma to Zuuvi
  2. Optimise for use across display, social, retail media, DOOH, video, and more
  3. Support for production-ready HTML5 ad creatives
  4. Maintain template structure and layer control for streamlined animation workflows


🚀 Why Use Zuuvi for Your Ad Production?

Zuuvi is a Creative Performance Platform that empowers marketers and designers to:


  1. Build high-quality, high-performing HTML5 ads at speed
  2. Personalise and localise creatives across channels and markets
  3. Scale ad production without adding design overhead
  4. Centralise all ad formats - from social media creatives to dynamic banners - in one platform


📚 Documentation & Support

Full plugin guide and step-by-step tutorials: https://help.zuuvi.com/en/articles/10774913-how-to-export-from-figma-to-zuuvi-studio


Questions? Reach out anytime via our live chat or care@zuuvi.com


🧩 Requirements

To use this plugin, an active Zuuvi account is required.

Not a user yet? Learn more and book a demo here.


🔒 Data Security

We value your creative integrity and your data privacy. Zuuvi follows best practices for security, and all plugin exports are processed securely through your Zuuvi account.


Design in Figma. Scale in Zuuvi.

From idea to high-performing ad campaign – Zuuvi makes creative production fast, scalable, and impactful.
plugins.tagline: Convert your Figma designs to omnichannel ad campaigns

plugins.name: Type Rhythm
plugins.description:
A simple plugin for efficiently adjusting typography in Figma. You can increase or decrease font size in 8px increments, and adjust line height in 10% increments. It also allows you to convert Auto line height to 150%. Using tools like Keyboard Maestro to set up shortcuts can enhance your workflow.


Figmaでの文字調整を効率的に行うためのシンプルなプラグインです。フォントサイズを8px単位で増減でき、行間を10%単位で調整可能です。Keyboard Maestroなどのツールを使用してショートカットを設定することで、ワークフローをさらに効率化できます。
plugins.tagline: You can increase or decrease font size in 8px increments.

plugins.name: FontFig
plugins.description:
🤔 How it works:


  1. 1. Choose a font. This will be your base font - it can either be a font you want to manipulate or just help you get a good foundation for the different characters
  2. 2. Import the font. Fontfig will generate an artboard for every character and convert every character into an SVG.
  3. 3. Get creative. Manipulate or create totally new characters.
  4. 4. Export your new font (Whoop)


👉 Pointers:


  1. 📄 One Font can be created / edited per page
  2. 💾 Export each font up to 5 times for one price.
  3. 📐 Adjust the width of the artboard to change letter spacing for each character
  4. 💪 Support for more complex fonts coming soon


💬 We need your feedback:


  1. Drop us a comment or message if you see anything you think could be better. We want to continually improve this Plugin so your feedback is super helpful!
plugins.tagline: Create your own fonts in Figma

plugins.name: bb-extract
plugins.description: With our Figma plugin, easily export design tokens to JSON format and gain the added advantage of live values! The plugin extends the 'import & export variables' example, streamlining the process by excluding imports and introducing a 'calculatedValue' property with actual color values (e.g., #00F instead of {colors.blue}). Now, you can seamlessly integrate design tokens directly into your codebase, making it a breeze to maintain a consistent design system. Simplify your design workflow and boost collaboration with this powerful plugin today!
plugins.tagline: Enhance your design token workflow with live values! 💫

93017.name: bb-extract
93017.description: With our Figma plugin, easily export design tokens to JSON format and gain the added advantage of live values! The plugin extends the 'import & export variables' example, streamlining the process by excluding imports and introducing a 'calculatedValue' property with actual color values (e.g., #00F instead of {colors.blue}). Now, you can seamlessly integrate design tokens directly into your codebase, making it a breeze to maintain a consistent design system. Simplify your design workflow and boost collaboration with this powerful plugin today!
93017.release_notes: Introduced a recursive check for local variables that reference other local variables, ensuring accurate calculation of values. This update resolves issues in previous versions where the target variable was located within a group inside a collection.
93017.tagline: Enhance your design token workflow with live values! 💫

plugins.name: SVG Exporter
plugins.description:
Este plugin te permite exportar elementos gráficos (assets) en formato SVG desde cualquier Frame que selecciones en Figma. Al ejecutarlo:

1. El plugin detecta automáticamente los vectores, íconos y componentes dentro del frame seleccionado.

2. Muestra una lista con vista previa de cada asset, su nombre y tipo (VECTOR, LINE, COMPONENT, etc.).

3. Puedes filtrar por tipo, seleccionar o deseleccionar assets individualmente o todos a la vez.

4. Al hacer clic en “Exportar selección”, los archivos se descargan en un ZIP listo para usar.


Uso paso a paso:

• Selecciona un Frame que contenga los assets que deseas exportar.

• Ejecuta el plugin.

• Filtra, selecciona y exporta.


Limitaciones actuales:

• Solo funciona si seleccionas un Frame (no soporta múltiples frames a la vez).

• Solo exporta elementos compatibles con formato SVG.

• No incluye imágenes rasterizadas, texto plano ni auto layout como exportables.

• No detecta automáticamente cambios de selección; requiere usar el botón “Actualizar selección”.



-----------------------------------------


This plugin lets you export graphical elements (assets) as SVG files from any selected Frame in Figma.


When you run the plugin:

1. It scans the selected frame for valid exportable elements (e.g., VECTORS, ICONS, COMPONENTS).

2. You’ll see a list of assets with preview thumbnails, names, and their Figma types.

3. You can filter by type, toggle selection, and bulk-select assets.

4. Clicking “Export Selection” downloads all selected assets as a clean ZIP file of SVGs.


How to use it:

• Select a Frame that contains the assets you want to export.

• Launch the plugin.

• Use the filters, select assets, and export.


Current limitations:

• Only one Frame can be selected at a time.

• Only elements that support SVG export will be included (e.g., no bitmaps or text layers).

• Does not automatically react to new selections — use the “Refresh Selection” button manually when needed.
plugins.tagline: Exporta fácilmente assets SVG desde frames seleccionados en Figma, con vista previa y filtros.

plugins.name: Grids Moodbook
plugins.description:
Effortlessly organize your design elements with Layout Magic – a powerful layout tool that automates arrangement using smart visual principles.


Whether you're designing responsive components, portfolios, or dashboards, Layout Magic helps you arrange selected frames and components into beautiful, functional layouts like:


🧱 Masonry Grid – Neatly stacks elements based on height.


🌟 Golden Ratio – Distributes elements proportionally for aesthetic balance.


🌀 Fibonacci Spiral – Creates a harmonious spiral layout inspired by nature.

plugins.name: Translate Text with Gemini
plugins.description:
Translate Text with Gemini is a powerful yet lightweight Figma plugin that helps you quickly translate any selected text nodes into over 30 languages using Google’s Gemini AI.


✨ Key Features:

•Supports App Store Connect languages (e.g. French, Japanese, Arabic, Vietnamese, etc.)

•Smart deduplication — identical phrases are only translated once

•Structured output parsing to ensure accurate mapping

•Custom language support beyond the dropdown list

•Built for speed and scale (bulk translate entire Frames/Sections)


🔒 Your API key is safely stored per session.


Created with ❤️ by Giang Nguyen.
plugins.tagline: Effortless multilingual translation for your Figma designs.

plugins.name: Spacing and radius fixer
plugins.description:
Auto-fix spacing & radius

Plugin that automatically rounds spacing and radius values to the nearest preset value in Auto Layout objects.


What it does

- Rounds gap and padding values to the nearest preset spacing

- Rounds corner radius to the nearest preset radius

- Works with any Auto Layout object (frames, components, instances)


Presets

Default values (can be customized in plugin):

Spacing: 0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 20, 24, 32, 40, 48, 56, 64, 80 (px)

Radius: 0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 20, 100 (px)


How to use

1. Select Auto Layout object(s)

2. Run the plugin

3. Switch between Spacing/Radius modes

4. Customize presets if needed (or use Reset to restore defaults)

5. Click Apply
plugins.tagline: Fixes inconsistent spacing and radius values by rounding them to the nearest preset

130781.name: Spacing and radius fixer
130781.description:
Auto-fix spacing & radius

Plugin that automatically rounds spacing and radius values to the nearest preset value in Auto Layout objects.


What it does

- Rounds gap and padding values to the nearest preset spacing

- Rounds corner radius to the nearest preset radius

- Works with any Auto Layout object (frames, components, instances)


Presets

Default values (can be customized in plugin):

Spacing: 0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 20, 24, 32, 40, 48, 56, 64, 80 (px)

Radius: 0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 20, 100 (px)


How to use

1. Select Auto Layout object(s)

2. Run the plugin

3. Switch between Spacing/Radius modes

4. Customize presets if needed (or use Reset to restore defaults)

5. Click Apply
130781.tagline: Fixes inconsistent spacing and radius values by rounding them to the nearest preset

plugins.name: OS converter
plugins.description:
Stop duplicating your work! Convert entire flows or single frames between iOS and Android in seconds — no more tedious manual adjustments.


Why OS Converter?

Designers are often faced with a choice:

  1. Design in one OS and leave conversions to developers
  2. Manually recreate each flow for both platforms


With OS Converter, you get the best of both worlds — fast, accurate, and hassle-free conversion.


How it works:

  1. Set up your components – Use a variant property named "OS" with values "iOS" and "Android"
  2. Run the plugin – When your layouts are ready to convert
  3. Click to swap! – Convert single frames or entire flows in one click
  4. 🎨 See it in action! Check out the sample file below.
plugins.tagline: Swap single frames or entire flows between iOS and Android in seconds!

plugins.name: Design Notes
plugins.description:
不用创建组件，快速保存和复用设计资源。

你可以

  1. 保存最近常用的图标、组件、图片等所有设计
  2. 快速创建克隆
  3. 在单独的页面快速备份设计稿，保持页面整洁
  4. 当作有历史记录的剪贴板使用

---

注意：

  1. 本插件仅记录元素的id信息用于检索，不存储实际设计内容
  2. 本地存储，不支持跨设备跨浏览器
  3. 不支持跨文件调用设计内容

---

Quickly save and reuse design resources without creating components.


You can:

  1. Save frequently used icons, components, images, and all design elements.
  2. Quickly create clones.
  3. Backup design drafts on a separate page to keep your workspace organized.
  4. Use it as a clipboard with history.


Note:

  1. This plugin only records the ID information of elements for retrieval and does not store actual design content.
  2. It uses local storage and does not support cross-device or cross-browser functionality.
  3. It also does not support calling design content across different files.

---

contact: Tylergg98@outlook.com
plugins.tagline: Simpy save and re-use your designs without managing components

plugins.name: Case Shifter
plugins.description:
Overview

Streamline your design workflow with the Frame Renamer plugin for Figma! This tool allows you to quickly and efficiently rename frame names, making it especially useful when organizing and exporting layers.


Features

  1. Quick Rename: Easily rename frames in bulk, saving time and effort.
  2. Organize Layers: Keep your Figma projects neat and well-organized by using consistent naming conventions.
  3. Efficient Exporting: Simplify your exporting process by standardizing layer names, reducing errors and improving efficiency.


Supported Naming Conventions

The Frame Renamer currently supports the following cases:

  1. camelCase: e.g., frameNameExample
  2. snake_case: e.g., frame_name_example
  3. kebab-case: e.g., frame-name-example
  4. PascalCase: e.g., FrameNameExample


Future Updates

We are continually working to improve the Frame Renamer plugin. Stay tuned for more features and naming conventions in future updates!
plugins.tagline: Transform your Layer name, one case at a time.
